name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Drupal Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, primarily in compliance-heavy environments such as healthcare and finance. Proficient in **Drupal**, with strong knowledge of **Test Automation** using **Cypress** and **Apache JMeter**, emphasizing **API Testing**, **Database Testing**, and **Performance Testing**. Expertise in **Agile Testing** methodologies and federal compliance frameworks including **FedRAMP**, **FISMA**, and **Section 508** standards.

Skilled in deploying cloud solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**, and adept in architecting CI/CD pipelines for robust software delivery. Well-versed in developing AI/ML-powered platforms utilizing **Python** and frameworks like **FastAPI** and **Django**. A solid background in full stack development ensures collaboration across both frontend and backend technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. Strong experience in MLOps for model training and orchestration, aligning with compliance regulations such as **HIPAA** and **PCI DSS**.
